name: agent-hive
description: Context-Driven Development for AI coding assistants

scripts.build: bun run --filter hive-core build && bun run --filter opencode-hive build && bun run --filter vscode-hive build
scripts.dev: bun run --filter hive-core build && bun run --filter '*' dev
scripts.release:check: bun install && bun run build && npm -ws --if-present run test
scripts.lint: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=lint
scripts.nx:build: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=build
scripts.nx:test: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=test
scripts.nx:lint: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=lint
scripts.nx:graph: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx graph --file=graph.json --watch=false --open=false
scripts.nx:affected:build: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx affected --target=build
scripts.nx:affected:test: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx affected --target=test
scripts.nx:affected:lint: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx affected --target=lint
scripts.format:check: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=format:check
scripts.format:write: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=format:write
scripts.nx:format:check: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=format:check
scripts.nx:format:write: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=format:write
scripts.typecheck: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=typecheck
scripts.nx:typecheck: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=typecheck
scripts.nx:affected:typecheck: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx affected --target=typecheck
scripts.nx:affected:format: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx affected --target=format:check
scripts.nx:build-storybook: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=build-storybook
scripts.nx:test-storybook: NX_TUI=false NX_DAEMON=false NX_NO_CLOUD=true bunx nx run-many --target=test-storybook
